QuestData.Title: Baleheim Must Burn!
QuestData.Description: Killing the Winterskorns maybe not enough. Maybe we burn their houses too! Uh... and their bridges. We should burn whole town to be safe!$B$BYou take this torch. Go to Baleheim, to the west, and burn EVERYTHING! That teach them good.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Gorth wants you to go to Baleheim and use Gorth's Torch to burn 1 Winterskorn Dwelling, 1 Winterskorn Watchtower, 1 Winterskorn Bridge and 1 Winterskorn Barracks.
QuestData.CompletionText: You done burning everything? Make sure you not leave something not burned.
QuestData.RewardText: I guess you burned everything. I see couple of spots not burning... but is close enough for Gorth.
